sentences.en: The shopkeeper has gone to the wholesaler to buy new products.
sentences.cn: 店主到批发商处进货去了。

sentences.en: He started working as a laborer at a state-owned food wholesaler.
sentences.cn: 他起先在一个食品批发部门做工人。

sentences.en: Retailers buy goods directly from the manufacturer or from a wholesaler.
sentences.cn: 零售商直接从制造商或从批发商那里购买商品。
